content: the simple crochet kitchen towel is perfect for beginners this pattern combines dishie yarn simple stitches and colorful stripes to make a fast and easy handmade dish towel for your kitchen switch up the colors to match whatever style you choose two strands of cotton yarn held together make this dish towel super absorbent and quick to work up visit www knottednest com for the free version of this pattern pattern download - please note this listing is for the pattern only - pattern is written in us terms - pattern includes written instructions stripe pattern chart and step-by-step pictures - this pattern will be delivered via email in the form of a digital file pdf upon purchase skill level easy -this pattern is beginner-friendly but does require some knowledge of basic stitches and pattern reading sizing 23 5 x 13 5 share your work follow along on instagram at @theknottednest tag @theknottednest and use the #crochetkitchentowel hashtag to show off your new project copyright the easy crochet kitchen towel pattern and photographs are property of the knotted nest and are for personal non-commercial use only you may not alter share or sell this pattern in any way however you are welcome to sell the finished product that you make using this pattern please credit the knotted nest by including a link to the pattern listing if selling the finished piece online
